keyword: how many calories in russet potato
title: How Many Calories in a Russet Potato?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in russet potato, including macros, fiber, and nutrition per medium baked potato with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in a Russet Potato?
assumptions: Medium russet potato (173 g), baked with skin, no added fat, butter, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels or sources for precision.

quick_answer.text: One medium baked russet potato provides ~168 kcal and ~4.6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one russet potato?
faqs.a: About 168 kcal for a medium baked russet potato with skin.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in a russet potato?
faqs.a: One medium has ~37 g carbs, including 4.6 g fiber.

faqs.q: Are russet potatoes high in protein?
faqs.a: Moderateâ€”~4.6 g protein per medium potato.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in russet potato?
faqs.a: Baked or boiled is low-cal; frying or adding oil/butter increases them significantly.

faqs.q: What size is a medium russet potato?
faqs.a: Typically 173 g or 5-6 oz; smaller ones have fewer calories, larger more.
